answers.answer: It *****! I was sick and puking my guts out and my son was sick and I had to take care of the both of us.
literally going thru the exact same thing! my doctor told me to take sudafed! helped a bit but i dont want to rely on it. im sticking to tea and chicken noodle soup.  hopefully it goes away soon. :(
No oj? Can you drink emergen-c? It's packed full of vitamins without the sugar..

Thank you ladies!! Yea... I can have a little OJ but not too much because it spikes my blood sugar :(  and thats even with the no sugar added orange juice... I will be soo glad when I'm no longer pregnant and the gestational diabetes goes away!! I have an appt tomorrow and am gonna ask what I can take... right now I'm taking airborne chewable tablets I'm just hoping I can get relief or sleep it all off

question: :(  I feel like crap... I caught a head cold a few days before I'm going out of town to visit family for Easter and I can't really take anything.... to make matters worse... one of my biggest defense mechanisms for being sick is drinking a TON of orange juice- like half a gallon a day.... and these gestational diabetes doesn't allow me to do that :(
title: Pregnant and sick...
